thebabycareproject

Class VaccineReminderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • thebabycareproject.VaccineReminderController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class VaccineReminderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller of the section ' Vaccine Reminder ' of the ' Reminder & Notifications ' category. Sends a reminder as an email. Email provided while creating account is the default recipient of the email. The running day can't be chosen for sending email.
